name: ABORTION-AND-GOLDEN-RULE.md
en_content: Abortion is a violation of the Golden Rule: "Do unto others as you would have them do into you."

name: ACCOUNTABILITY.md
en_content: God doesn't spare you the consequences of my actions.

name: ACCURATE-THEOLOGY.md
en_content: The more accurate our theology, the easier the Christian life gets.

name: AGREEING-WITH-OPPRESSOR.md
en_content: Every day we do things to let the Opressor know that we AGREE that his money is worth more than justice, dignity, equity and honor.

name: ALIGNING-THROUGH-PRAYER.md
en_content: The purpose of prayer is not just to get God to do stuff, but to align myself with what God is doing!

name: ALL-OF-GOD-JESUS.md
en_content: Jesus Christ is the only Man Who could fit ALL OF GOD in Himself, because HE IS GOD!

name: ALL-THINGS-FOR-HIM.md
en_content: All things are from, to and for Him; this is fitting, for He is worthy.

name: ALL-TRUTH-GODS.md
en_content: All truth belongs to God.

name: ALONZO-CHURCH-FAITH.md
en_content: Alonzo Church Ph.D, Inventor of the lambda calculus, was a devout Christian...who says science and faith don't mix?

name: ALWAYS-ADVENTIST.md
en_content: A part of me will always be Adventist, I guess (smile).

name: AMERICA-ACCOUNTABLE-FREEDOMS.md
en_content: America, God will hold you accountable for the way you spent your freedoms.

name: AMERICA-CHEATS-ITSELF.md
en_content: America is a nation that CHEATS ITSELF out of its own money.

name: AMERICAN-POVERTY-LINE.md
en_content: 46 million Americans are at or below the poverty line.

name: ANGER-AND-PAIN.md
en_content: Anger as a first response is often indicative of an underlying issue...that issue usually being pain.

name: ANGER-AS-CONTAGION.md
en_content: Anger is a contagion that easily leaps from soul to soul where there is an absence of reason.

name: ANNIHILATION-OF-EVIL.md
en_content: Evil itself is doomed to annihilation...forever.

name: APOCALYPSE-BETTER-WORLD.md
en_content: The Better World is coming! Apocalypse!

name: APOSTLES-AS-VISION.md
en_content: The Apostles loved Jesus' Vision because the Apostles WERE Jesus' Vision!

name: APPEARING-HUMAN.md
en_content: Beware of those who appear human, but ain't!

name: ARROGANCE-VS-DIGNITY.md
en_content: Far too many black men have mistaken arrogance for dignity.

name: ASK-GOD-PERFECTION.md
en_content: Perfection isn't that difficult...ask God!

name: ATHEISM-SUCKS.md
en_content: The problem with believing you're a thing is that you'll start treating other people as things. Atheism sucks!

name: ATOMS-IN-CELL.md
en_content: The average human cell is made of approx. 200 trillion atoms...God is great!

name: ATROCITIES-OF-RELIGION.md
en_content: It's amazing what atrocities religion will allow.

name: ATTENTION-DESIRE.md
en_content: I only want your attention when you don't want to give it to me.

name: ATTRACTION-TO-FORBIDDEN.md
en_content: What attracts us to the forbidden? Sin.

name: AVOIDING-GOD-AND-CHURCH.md
en_content: Why do African American men avoid God and His Church???

name: AWARENESS-OF-PRESENCE.md
en_content: Many believe they are aware of God's Wrath but few are aware of God's Loving Presence.

name: BAG-OF-CHEMICALS-DUPED.md
en_content: It's hard to fathom that people can be duped into thinking they're nothing more than a bag of chemicals and electricity.

name: BAILOUT-AND-HATE.md
en_content: Obama bailed out the Republicans...which made them hate him all the more.

name: BEGINNING-OF-MISERY.md
en_content: Misery began when some idiot decided he was more important than God.

name: BELONGING-TO-GOD.md
en_content: If we don't belong to God, we belong to ourselves...and shall perish in ourselves because we choose not to live in God.

name: BETTER-NOT-EASIER.md
en_content: Jesus did not come to make our lives easier; Christ came to make our lives better!

name: BETTER-TREATMENT-JESUS.md
en_content: Jesus treats me FAR BETTER than I've treated Him. I crucified Him; He gave me LIFE!

name: BIBLE-AS-HISTORY.md
en_content: The Bible says that God cannot lie. If therefore the Bible is not an ACCURATE HISTORICAL DOCUMENT, then it cannot be inspired by God.

name: BIBLE-HOW-TO-EAT.md
en_content: The Bible not only tells us how to live, but also HOW TO EAT!

name: BORED-VS-BORING.md
en_content: Better to be bored than to be boring.

name: BORN-FOR-SERMON.md
en_content: Christmas sermon at the Pittsburgh prison was well-received...this is what I was born to do!

name: BORN-TWICE.md
en_content: Born once, die twice; born twice, die once--Happy Resurrection Day!

name: BOUNTIFUL-EYE.md
en_content: Whoever has a bountiful eye will be blessed, for he shares his bread with the poor. Proverbs 22:9, ESV

name: BOX-JELLYFISH-EYES.md
en_content: The box jellyfish--nature's most poisonous creature--has 24 eyes and 360-degree vision...God is great!

name: BREAD-OF-LIFE.md
en_content: We overeat in our attempt to feed our starving spirit with natural food instead of The BREAD of LIFE which is Christ.

name: BUILD-ON-THE-ROCK.md
en_content: You can build WITH Gold, but you can't build ON Gold; you must build on The ROCK...it's not as shiny, but it's a lot stronger!

name: CARDBOARD-BOX-DIGNITY.md
en_content: I'd rather live in a cardboard box than to earn 6 figures and be treated like a pet!

name: CARNALITY-AND-STRIFE.md
en_content: 1 Corinthians 3:3: "...for whereas there is among you envying, and strife, and divisions, are ye not carnal, and walk as men?"

name: CAT-LICK-NECK.md
en_content: My cat can lick its own neck...God is great!

name: CAT-ON-KNEE.md
en_content: My cat will jump up on my knee, and from there knock things off the table so he can play with them on the floor...God is great!

name: CAUSE-OF-THE-ORPHAN.md
en_content: "They do not plead the cause, (The cause of the orphan), THAT THEY MAY PROSPER; And they do not defend the rights of the poor." -- Jeremiah

name: CHANGE-OTHERS-NOT-SELF.md
en_content: We want God to change everyone but ourselves; for the truth is that change can be a painful process...even when God is performing it.

name: CHANGING-EVIL-TO-RIGHTEOUS.md
en_content: God's Other Genius is changing evil people into righteous people!

name: CHANGING-THE-HEART.md
en_content: Proverbs 21:1; Matthew 19:25, 26. God has--and uses--the ability to change the heart's intent...otherwise no one would be saved.

name: CHEATING-THE-ECONOMY.md
en_content: As long as we feel it necessary to cheat, lie and steal to survive, our economy will never truly prosper.

name: CHEMICAL-VIRTUE.md
en_content: You yourself are a supernatural being! Explain LOVE, or COURAGE or VIRTUE chemically.

name: CHRIST-COMING-CLOUDS.md
en_content: History is going to play out just as the Bible says; what are you going to do when you see Christ coming in the clouds of Heaven?

name: CHRIST-MY-TREASURE.md
en_content: Christ is my Treasure, my Fortune, my Wealth, my NestEgg and my Riches!

name: CHRIST-UNIVERSAL-DESTINY.md
en_content: Christ is everyone's Destiny...no exceptions!

name: CHRISTIANITY-STEPS.md
en_content: Christianity: READ, HEAR, BELIEVE, CONFESS, OBEY, ASK, RECEIVE.

name: CHRISTIANS-ON-CROSSES.md
en_content: True Christians are easy to identify: they're the ones hanging on crosses.

name: CHRISTS-AMNESTY.md
en_content: Humanity's trial is over, and we have been judged. Execution of sentence is nearer than we realize. Christ is God's Only Amnesty.

name: CHRISTS-FINAL-VIRTUE.md
en_content: Humanity's Last and only remaining Virtue is Jesus Christ; rejecting Him is turning our backs on the only Good left to us.

name: CHRONIC-SELF-DESTRUCTION.md
en_content: As a species the homosapien is chronically self-destructive and IT CANNOT STOP ITSELF...therefore God must judge it.

name: CHURCH-AS-LOVE-GROUP.md
en_content: The number of hate groups has doubled the last 10 years. Where's the love groups? Oh yeah: that's what the CHURCH's supposed to be!

name: CHURCH-IS-BIG-BUSINESS.md
en_content: In America church is big business...that's a problem.

name: CHURCH-PILLAR-OF-TRUTH.md
en_content: 1 Tim. 3:15: The Church of God is the Pillar and Ground of the Truth on Earth, and to attack and criticize her is perilous.

name: COMMITTING-ADAMS-SIN.md
en_content: We continue to commit Adam's sin, and then wonder why we suffer.

name: COMMUNICATION-SYSTEMS.md
en_content: Every communication system must have a language, a medium, a device that reads, and an intelligence that writes/interprets...God is Great!

name: COMPLEXITY-VS-SIMPLICITY.md
en_content: There is no "natural law" that would bring complexity out of simplicity!

name: COMPREHENDING-VS-KNOWING.md
en_content: If I could comprehend Him, He wouldn't be God; but I can know Him.

name: CONGRESS-HOUSE-LORDS.md
en_content: Both houses of this American Congress have become a House of Lords.

name: CONGRESS-NO-PAY-SHUTDOWN.md
en_content: Congress should not get paid as long as the Federal Government is shut down!

name: CONGRESS-NOT-OURS.md
en_content: The United States Congress no longer belongs to the American People.

name: CONTRACTOR-NOT-SLAVE.md
en_content: A contractor is NOT a slave.

name: COOKED-FOOD-HUMANS.md
en_content: Why are humans the only creatures on planet earth that eat cooked food?

name: CORPORATE-MONEY-WORSHIP.md
en_content: The corporation as a legal "person" worships money.

name: CORPORATE-RACISM.md
en_content: Racism, Discrimination and Prejudice are alive and well in Corporate America.

name: CORRUPTION-WITHOUT-DEATH.md
en_content: Watched movie "In Time"; without death, humanity would be even more hideously corrupt than it is now.

name: COST-OF-HEAVEN.md
en_content: Heaven is free--but it ain't cheap!

name: COURAGE-THROUGH-PRAYER.md
en_content: Prayer is where I find Courage and Perseverance.

name: CREATING-SELFLESS-HEART.md
en_content: Only God can create a selfless heart from a pile of dust.

name: CREATORS-SUFFERING.md
en_content: Better for all of us to have gone to Hell than for Our Precious Creator to have suffered the way He did.

name: CRY-OF-POOR.md
en_content: Whoever closes his ear to the cry of the poor will himself call out and not be answered. Proverbs 21:13, ESV

name: DAILY-DIVINE-LOVE.md
en_content: Though I may deserve Wrath I still need Love...and God gives me His Love every morning!

name: DAMNING-THE-ARROGANT.md
en_content: How does God damn a sinner? By letting them prosper in their arrogance.

name: DANGER-OF-TRUTH.md
en_content: Truth is a dangerous thing...yet so is a lie.

name: DANGEROUS-AND-SAFE.md
en_content: Who is more dangerous than God? Who is more safe than The Almighty?

name: DARK-MATTER-NEED.md
en_content: If the Standard Model was doing its job, there'd be no need for "dark matter", "dark energy" or "dark flow"!

name: DEATH-SELF-INFLICTED-WOUND.md
en_content: Death is not natural; it's a self-inflicted wound we incurred when we separated ourselves from God through disobedience.

name: DEFINE-APATHY.md
en_content: Love & hate are not opposites...they are 2 halves of the same coin; the opposite of love / hate is Apathy.

name: DEFINE-BEING-ALONE.md
en_content: The true definition of being alone is being unaware of God's Loving Presence.

name: DEFINE-DIVINE-JEALOUSY.md
en_content: Divine Jealousy: Ownership in Love with Responsibility and Accountability.

name: DEFINE-EVIL-JEALOUSY.md
en_content: Evil Jealousy: fear of loss.

name: DEFINE-EXQUISITAGIOUS.md
en_content: New Word: exquisitagious Meaning: something so exquisite that the feeling's contagious!

name: DEFINE-FAITH-PERSUASION.md
en_content: Faith is not me persuading God to keep His Promises, but God persuading me that He is watching over His Word to perform It.

name: DEFINE-FAITH-WILL.md
en_content: New Definition of Faith: KNOWING God's Will for me in every situation.

name: DEFINE-GRACE.md
en_content: GRACE is God saying "I like you! I'm gonna cut you a break!"

name: DEFINE-HOPE.md
en_content: HOPE = DESIRE + EXPECTATION

name: DEFINE-PERFECT-LOVE.md
en_content: Love: the blurring of identity between two or more persons. The Love among the Members of The Godhead is such: to see One is to see All.

name: DEFINE-TRUST.md
en_content: TRUST is born of both confidence and ignorance.

name: DEFINING-EVIL-PRIDE.md
en_content: Evil is considering this God-given treasure (Self) more precious than The God Who gave it.

name: DEFINING-PORNOGRAPHY.md
en_content: Matthew 5:27-30: Porn is adultery to a married man and fornication to a bachelor.

name: DEHUMANIZING-LABOR-WATCHING.md
en_content: To those that continue to dehumanize blue and white collar laborers: GOD IS WATCHING.

name: DESTROYING-OUR-PLANET.md
en_content: Our technology, industry and greed are destroying our planet.

name: DESTROYING-THE-EARTH.md
en_content: God will destroy us for destroying the Earth (Revelation 11:18).

name: DEVIL-THE-ACCUSER.md
en_content: The Devil is called the Accuser (Prosecutor) for a reason: he directs our focus to what we have done than what Christ has done for us.

name: DIGNITY-OR-DEATH.md
en_content: Give me DIGNITY or give me death!

name: DISABILITY-OF-SPIRIT.md
en_content: The inability to perceive God's Immediate Presence is a greater disability than not being able to walk or see.

name: DISENFRANCHISING-POOR-WATCHING.md
en_content: To those that continue to disenfranchise the poor and minorities: GOD IS WATCHING.

name: DIVINE-MERCY-HOPE.md
en_content: Apart from Divine Mercy there is no hope for the human race.

name: DIVINE-VISITATION-EFFECT.md
en_content: A Divine Visitation will ruin you for this life. You may look and act like everyone, but you're not like them...you're of another World.

name: DNA-MEMORY-VS-REINCARNATION.md
en_content: Reincarnation: what if these memories are not of previous lives, but of the lives of our ancestors engraved on our spirits/DNA?

name: DONT-KNOW-DOING.md
en_content: God! Forgive us! WE DON'T KNOW WHAT WE'RE DOING!! Luke 23:34

name: DREAMS-OTHER-WORLDS.md
en_content: What if dreams were peeks into another life...on another planet ...in another galaxy very similar to ours?

name: DYING-FOR-OWN-SIN.md
en_content: I die--not for Adam's sin but for my own; for I was in Adam when he sinned and therefore sinned with him!

name: EARTH-SPEED-SPACE.md
en_content: The Earth is tearing thru space at over 667,000 MPH, and we're not dead ...God is great!

name: EARTH-STORMS.md
en_content: Earth has about 16 million storms per year...God is Great!

name: EATING-BREATHING-DEATH.md
en_content: We insist on eating and breathing death (meat and cigarettes) and then wonder why we get sick and die so fast and why healthcare costs are so high!

name: EDUCATION-AND-SCRIPTURE.md
en_content: How can anyone be considered educated without having surveyed the Holy Scriptures?

name: EDUCATION-AS-SELLING-OUT.md
en_content: At what point in history did African American men decide that being educated was selling out??

name: ELECTROMAGNETISM-TOUCH.md
en_content: Under normal circumstances, electromagnetism prevents any 2 surfaces from touching...God is great!

name: EMULATING-GODS-CHARACTER.md
en_content: What kind of person is God? The kind I've always admired and desired to emulate.

name: ENDANGERED-BLACK-MEN.md
en_content: African American men have ALWAYS been the targets of genocide...we are an ENDANGERED SPECIES.

name: EQUALITY-AT-RETURN.md
en_content: True economic political and social equality will never exist on Earth until Christ returns.

name: ESSENCE-OF-JOY.md
en_content: The essence of Joy is to discover that God is more wonderful, more great and more important than I.

name: ETERNAL-GRACE-MERCY.md
en_content: Psalm 136: Grace, Mercy and Kindness will never be obsolete; they endure forever.

name: ETERNAL-IMMORTALITY.md
en_content: If you die eternally, you're already dead; if you live eternally, you were always immortal!

name: EVERYTHING-FROM-NOTHING.md
en_content: Saying that everything came from nothing makes no sense.

name: EVERYTHING-IS-SIMPLE.md
en_content: To God complexity itself does not exists...everything is simple to God.

name: EVIL-NO-CHANCE.md
en_content: Look at God. Evil never had a chance!

name: EVOLUTION-COMPASSION-MERCY.md
en_content: Can evolution explain Compassion? Mercy?

name: EXISTENCE-TAX.md
en_content: Cost of Living: Men can't CREATE Life...so they're gonna charge it an existence tax...are you kidding me?!?

name: EXPERIENCING-GOD.md
en_content: You don't want to live your entire life and die without experiencing God.

name: EXPLOITING-BLACK-WOMEN.md
en_content: At what point in history did African American men decide that exploiting black women was acceptable behavior??

name: EYES-OF-CHRIST.md
en_content: From the smallest subatomic particle to the deepest intent of the human heart, the Eyes of Christ miss nothing.

name: FACE-TO-FACE.md
en_content: When you meet God face to Face you will not ask any questions; His Glory is the answer to every question and the end of every dispute.

name: FACING-TRUTH-LOVE.md
en_content: It's God's Love for us that enables us to face the truth about ourselves.

name: FAITH-AND-WEALTH.md
en_content: Faith is the closest we can get to free wealth.

name: FAITH-IN-SELF-VS-CREATOR.md
en_content: We have more faith in ourselves than we have in our Creator; this is a recipe for disaster.

name: FAITH-REQUIRES-LOVE.md
en_content: True Faith is impossible to achieve without LOVE.

name: FALSE-RELIGION-TWIN.md
en_content: The Twin of Wickedness is False Religion.

name: FALSE-SPIRITUALITY.md
en_content: False Spirituality: placing the Devil around every corner, under every rock and behind every bush to cover defects of character.

name: FAMILIAR-SPIRITS-WARNING.md
en_content: "You do not turn nor seek to those having familiar spirits nor necromancers to be unclean by them; I am YHWH your God." -- Leviticus 19:31

name: FAN-VS-FOLLOWER.md
en_content: You can be a fan of Christ yet not a follower; but you cannot be a follower and not be a fan!

name: FAST-LANE-BLIND-SPOTS.md
en_content: If you're living in the fast lane, watch your blind spots.

name: FEAR-AND-SELFISHNESS.md
en_content: Fear wouldn't be so debilitating if I were not so selfish.

name: FEAR-AS-BAD-MOTIVE.md
en_content: Fear is rarely a good motive for any action.

name: FICTIONAL-CHARACTERS.md
en_content: Compared to GOD we are all fictional characters.

name: FIRST-LOVE-WAITING.md
en_content: Prayer is where my First Love is always waiting for me!

name: FLESH-THE-TYRANT.md
en_content: The Flesh is a tyrant.

name: FOR-OR-AGAINST.md
en_content: "Whoever is not for Me is against Me." -- Jesus Christ

name: FORGIVE-AND-SANCTIFY.md
en_content: God can forgive any sin and sanctify any sinner.

name: FORGIVING-OTHERS-PROBLEM.md
en_content: If a person has received forgiveness from God for EVERY sin, why would they have a problem forgiving anyone else?

name: FORGIVING-THE-FUTURE.md
en_content: We're so busy struggling to forgive the past we never consider the necessity of forgiving the future.

name: FOSSIL-AMINO-ACIDS.md
en_content: Why is it that amino acids are still found in fossils and are not broken down after hundreds of millions of years?

name: FOURTH-BRANCH-CHURCH.md
en_content: The true power of the Church is demonstrated by its tax-free status AND that no one's willing to ADMIT it's the 4th Branch of the U.S. Gov.

name: FREE-WILL-ROBOT.md
en_content: If you WERE a robot...HOW WOULD YOU KNOW your will wasn't free?

name: FREEDOM-TO-RUIN.md
en_content: It appears that God has given us the freedom to ruin our lives as we see fit...so much for Freedom.

name: FULFILLING-DESTINY-TOGETHER.md
en_content: I can only fulfill my destiny by assisting you in fulfilling yours.

name: FUTILE-REBELLION.md
en_content: Rebellion against God is futile!

name: FUTURE-FOR-ATHEISTS.md
en_content: Is there any future for a species that so despises its Creator as to announce that He doesn't exist?

name: GALATIANS-LAW-DEBATE.md
en_content: The debate of Galatians is not over the law, but whether or not keeping the law will save one WHO HAS ALREADY BROKEN IT.

name: GETTING-VS-BEING.md
en_content: We are more concerned with GETTING more than we are BEING more.

name: GIANT-BALL-OF-DIRT.md
en_content: We are living on a GIANT BALL OF DIRT...God is great!

name: GLOBAL-DICTATORSHIPS.md
en_content: 2 billion of the 7 billion people on this planet live under dictatorships.

name: GLOBAL-ECONOMICS-FOOTSTOOL.md
en_content: Global economics: God is making Christ's enemies His Footstool.

name: GLOBAL-WARMING-ILLUSION.md
en_content: Do you still believe global warming is an illusion?

name: GLORIFIED-IN-HUMANITY.md
en_content: God WILL be glorified in Humanity: either by rewarding obedience, faith and courage...or by punishing rebellion, unbelief and cowardice.

name: GLORY-THROUGH-LOSERS.md
en_content: God prefers losers so that when we win God gets the glory!

name: GOD-ACTUALLY-EXISTS.md
en_content: The idea that a Being such as That described in the Bible (God) actually exists should frighten us all...and it will.

name: GOD-ALWAYS-RIGHT.md
en_content: Only God is right about everything.

name: GOD-CARES-LITTLE.md
en_content: God cares about the little people. He made the big people to care for the little people.

name: GOD-CONFIDENCE.md
en_content: God-confidence is better than self-confidence.

name: GOD-HAS-SENSE.md
en_content: God has sense: if you talk to Him He'll talk to you; if you listen to Him He'll listen to you; if you'll honor Him He'll honor you.

name: GOD-HIDING-PLAIN-SIGHT.md
en_content: Sure, God is hiding...in plain sight.

name: GOD-HIGHER-THAN-TRUTH.md
en_content: "There is no god higher than Truth." - Gandhi. "There is no truth higher than God." - Mitchell

name: GOD-IS-BEAUTY.md
en_content: God is Beauty. Apart from Him we are ugly.

name: GOD-IS-FUTURE.md
en_content: God is your Future.

name: GOD-IS-REAL.md
en_content: In these uncertain times GOD IS REAL...but not much else.

name: GOD-IS-RICH.md
en_content: God ain't broke.

name: GOD-LOVES-ABUSERS.md
en_content: God loves abusers.

name: GOD-LOVES-HOMOSEXUALS.md
en_content: God loves homosexuals.

name: GOD-LOVES-KINDNESS.md
en_content: God loves Kindness!

name: GOD-LOVING-EVERY-SOUL.md
en_content: There is no soul created by God that He did not love.

name: GOD-NOT-AMERICAN.md
en_content: God is NOT an American.

name: GOD-NOT-DEADBEAT.md
en_content: God is not a deadbeat... He takes care of His own.

name: GOD-OF-FINANCE.md
en_content: Jesus Christ is The God of Finance and Economics.

name: GOD-OF-PROJECTS.md
en_content: Jesus Christ is The God of Project Management.

name: GOD-OF-SCIENCE.md
en_content: Jesus Christ is The God of Wisdom, Knowledge, Science and Technology.

name: GOD-REALITY.md
en_content: As I was watching TV I realized: God is real...we're just cartoon characters compared to Him!

name: GOD-SAVES-BREAKING.md
en_content: God will save you...after He breaks you. Matthew 21:44

name: GOD-SIRED-CHRIST.md
en_content: God did not create Christ, He SIRED Him! That's why Jesus is called THE ONLY BEGOTTEN of the Father.

name: GOD-TALKING-BACK.md
en_content: "YOU DO NOT TALK TO ME." - God

name: GOD-THE-ANSWER.md
en_content: The fact that God is That Single Answer does not in any way diminish the wonder of His Creation.

name: GOD-THE-RECYCLER.md
en_content: God recycles.

name: GOD-WANTS-ME.md
en_content: Everybody demands something from me, but only God wants me.

name: GODS-FORGETFULNESS.md
en_content: Don't bring to mind what God has decided to forget.

name: GODS-GENIUS-LOVE-HATE.md
en_content: What identifies God's Genius is the ability to hate evil while simultaneously loving evil people.

name: GODS-PERFECT-LOVE.md
en_content: God loves us with ALL His Heart, Soul, Mind and Strength!

name: GODS-PRIORITIES-VS-OURS.md
en_content: The things that are important to God are rarely important to us.

name: GODS-SELF-PORTRAIT.md
en_content: Jesus Christ is God's Self Portrait, etched on the canvas of humanity by the Holy Spirit.

name: GODS-STRENGTH-NEED.md
en_content: "I don't need your strength...you need Mine." -- God

name: GODS-SUPERIOR-OFFER.md
en_content: God has FAR MORE to offer me than I have to offer Him.

name: GODS-SUPERIOR-VALUE.md
en_content: In the REAL WORLD, God is more valuable than all of us put together.

name: GODS-WILL-AND-POWER.md
en_content: God has His Own Will and Desire and more than enough Power to execute Them.

name: GODS-WILL-IN-ME.md
en_content: I can't make God do anything; yet He effortlessly executes His Will in me without my awareness of the act.

name: GOOD-STRONGER-EVIL.md
en_content: Jesus PROVED that Good is stronger than Evil...that Righteousness is MORE POWERFUL than Sin!

name: GORGEOUS-DIVINITY.md
en_content: God is overwhelmingly gorgeous...both inside and out!

name: GRACE-STRONGER-SIN.md
en_content: Grace is stronger than sin, else no one could be saved. Ephesians 2:8, 9

name: GRACE-TO-HUMBLE.md
en_content: Salvation in a Nutshell: God resists the proud, but gives Grace to the humble.

name: GRACE-VS-SATAN.md
en_content: Apart from Grace, what difference is there between me and Satan? He's older and smarter...other than that we're both petty little monsters.

name: GREATER-THAN-BEING-LOVED.md
en_content: What could be greater than being loved? Being able to love!

name: GREED-ECONOMIC-WOES.md
en_content: The true source of our economic woes is GREED; therefore no recovery will ever be permanent until Christ returns.

name: GROWTH-THROUGH-WORD.md
en_content: I cannot grow as a Christian without consistently hearing and speaking God's Word.

name: HAPPINESS-OF-GIVING.md
en_content: God is happier than everyone else because He gives more than anyone else.

name: HAPPY-IF-GOD-PLEASED.md
en_content: How can I not be happy if God is pleased with me?

name: HATRED-AND-LOVE.md
en_content: One who is incapable of hatred is also incapable of love.

name: HEARING-GOD-NOISE.md
en_content: We cannot hear God through the noise of our own desire.

name: HEAVEN-AS-SUN.md
en_content: What is Heaven like? The center of the Sun!

name: HEAVEN-BY-GRACE.md
en_content: I know I have no business being in Heaven--but I'm going...such is the Power of Divine Grace!

name: HEAVEN-HEALS-SORROW.md
en_content: Earth has no sorrow that Heaven cannot heal. -- Hymn

name: HEAVEN-HOME-WITHIN.md
en_content: Before I can go Home to Heaven, Heaven must find a home in me.

name: HEAVEN-WITHIN-SALVATION.md
en_content: The objective of Salvation is not to get you into Heaven, but to get Heaven into you.

name: HEAVY-DIVINE-WILL.md
en_content: The Will of God is far too heavy for frail human hands to budge it in any direction; answered prayer is ALWAYS an Act of Divine Mercy.

name: HELL-AND-HYPOCRISY.md
en_content: If I send you to Hell, it's guaranteed that I will be following you shortly.

name: HELL-FIRE-FOR-DEVIL.md
en_content: Hell Fire wasn't made by the Devil...it was made for the Devil by God.

name: HIDING-IN-PRAYER.md
en_content: Prayer is where I hide from the world.

name: HISTORICAL-ACCURACY-BIBLE.md
en_content: The God in The Bible is described as Truth; therefore The Bible itself must be HISTORICALLY ACCURATE.

name: HOLLYWOOD-VIOLENCE-PREMISE.md
en_content: The original premise of Hollywood violence was "If they're watching violence they're not committing it."...Oops!

name: HONESTY-THROUGH-LOVE.md
en_content: When you know God loves you, it's easier to be honest about your faults.

name: HORDES-OF-THE-ABYSS.md
en_content: Humanity will be visited by the hordes of the Abyss because that is what it, by its deeds, asked for.

name: HUMAN-BREATHS-DAILY.md
en_content: The average human takes 17,280-23,040 breaths per day; God is great!

name: HUMANITY-TOO-FAR-GONE.md
en_content: The Bible teaches that humanity is too far gone to have any desire for the One True God; God has to put it in us to save us.

name: HUMILITY-IN-PRAYER.md
en_content: Prayer needs no Humility to be spoken, but no prayer is heard without it.

name: HUMILITY-OF-CREATION.md
en_content: It was The Supreme Act of Humility for God, Who doesn't need anything, to create something!

name: I-NEED-GOD.md
en_content: Revelation 20:11, 12: I don't need a universe to exist; I just need God.

name: IDENTITY-IN-GOD.md
en_content: The only reason anyone would want to be "normal" or "like everyone else" is that they do not know who they are in God!

name: IMAGE-OF-GOD.md
en_content: I'm NOT the child of monkeys; I was created in God's Image and after His Likeness; I should be treated as such--and so should you!

name: IMMORTAL-SINLESS-LIFE.md
en_content: An immortal life is a sinless life.

name: IMPORTANCE-OF-DEUTERONOMY.md
en_content: I'm convinced that the most important book of the Old Testament is Deuteronomy, which contains the ENTIRE PANORAMA of Biblical history.

name: INCARCERATION-SLAVERY-PARALLEL.md
en_content: Today in the USA there are more black people incarcerated than there were black slaves in 1850. Thank you, America!

name: INCONVENIENT-WILL.md
en_content: Accomplishing God's Will is rarely convenient.

name: INCORRUPTIBLE-GOODNESS.md
en_content: Good is greater than evil; for the Fountain of All Good (God) has never been nor can ever be corrupted by evil.

name: INTELLIGENT-DESIGN-PROOF.md
en_content: There is TONS of evidence for Intelligent Design evolutionists don't want you to know.

name: INTELLIGENT-LIFE-SEARCH.md
en_content: Why is it that all of the instruments seeking intelligent life in the universe are pointed away from Earth?

name: INTERIOR-MISSISSIPPI.md
en_content: "You know what they say: 'Between Pittsburgh and Philadelphia is Mississippi!'" -- Anonymous

name: INVESTMENT-IN-CHURCH.md
en_content: If you put something into your church, you'll ALWAYS get something out!

name: INVISIBLE-IN-IMPOSSIBLE.md
en_content: God is invisible except in the impossible.

name: JESUS-AND-SCRIPTURE.md
en_content: Jesus treated the Scriptures as the Testimony of God...I would be foolish to do otherwise.

name: JESUS-NON-NEGOTIABLE.md
en_content: I must have Jesus...everything else is negotiable.

name: JESUS-TAKES-OVER.md
en_content: "I come: not to take sides, but to take over." - Jesus Christ

name: JUDGING-MOTIVES-DEEDS.md
en_content: While your neighbor is looking at your deeds to judge your motives, God is looking at your motives to judge your deeds!

name: JUDGMENT-OF-NATIONS.md
en_content: God will not only judge individuals, but nations (ethnic and political). May God grant repentance to the USA.

name: KNOWING-JESUS-NAME.md
en_content: Matthew 7:22, 23 -- Using Jesus' Name doesn't mean you know Jesus.

name: KNOWLEDGE-PROPERTY-GOD.md
en_content: Genesis 2:15, 16: Knowledge is not a right; knowledge is the property of God.

name: LAWS-AND-THE-RICH.md
en_content: As long as the laws favor the rich, the poor will always exist.

name: LEAVING-GOD-OUT.md
en_content: We've left God out.

name: LEGALITY-OF-ATONEMENT.md
en_content: IT'S NOT LEGAL for you AND Jesus to suffer for the same sin!

name: LIFE-FROM-INORGANIC.md
en_content: In 13 billion years 100 monkeys will never write a novel and life will never rise from inorganic matter without an Act of God.

name: LIFE-IN-PRAYER.md
en_content: There is no life outside of Prayer.

name: LIFE-SHOULD-BE-PAIN.md
en_content: Many will tell you life is pain; not many will say it should be. It should be.

name: LIGHTNING-BOLT.md
en_content: A single lightning bolt can be 5 miles in length and hotter than the surface of the Sun...God is Great!

name: LIMITLESS-DIVINE-POWER.md
en_content: ABSOLUTE POWER: Besides His Own Limitless Power, everyone else's power is also at God's Disposal...even Satan's.

name: LIMITS-OF-KNOWLEDGE.md
en_content: "If any man thinks he knows anything, he does not yet know as he ought." -- The Apostle Paul

name: LIVELIER-LIVING.md
en_content: Soap makes water wetter; Jesus Christ makes living livelier!

name: LIVING-IN-CHRISTS-RIGHTEOUSNESS.md
en_content: I live--not with my own righteousness but with Christ's; for God placed me in Christ when He obeyed...now He obeys in me!

name: LOOKING-LIKE-JESUS.md
en_content: Jesus is what you look like to God!

name: LOSING-MY-MIND.md
en_content: I was insane until I lost my mind!

name: LOVE-ABUSER-HATE-ABUSE.md
en_content: God loves abusers (it's the act of abuse He has a problem with).

name: LOVE-CHANGES-SINNER.md
en_content: It is the LOVE OF GOD that changes a sinner to a saint.

name: LOVE-HATER-GRACE.md
en_content: To love the one who loves you is pleasure. To love the one who ignores you is compassion. To love the one who hates you is Grace.

name: LOVE-IS-NOT-WEAK.md
en_content: Love is not weak.

name: LOVE-SEVERING-SIN.md
en_content: Only Love can separate sinners from their sins.

name: LOVING-THE-HATEFUL.md
en_content: Loving the hateful... how does God do it? How can I do it?

name: LOYALTY-TO-GOD.md
en_content: What pleases God? Loyalty...at whatever cost to yourself, your family or your friends.

name: LUCIFERS-DECEPTION.md
en_content: God knew what Lucifer was doing...and allowed him to tempt, deceive and lead astray one third of Heaven.

name: LUCIFERS-WRETCHEDNESS.md
en_content: What a wretch Lucifer must be, to despise his most ardent Supporter!

name: MAJORITY-OF-THREE.md
en_content: The Godhead is a Majority of Three: Their LIFE far outweighs all Death in the Cosmos...and their GOODNESS overwhelms all Evil!

name: MALCOLM-X-TRUTH.md
en_content: Malcolm X loved his people enough to tell them the Truth about themselves.

name: MAN-OF-SORROWS.md
en_content: Jesus was a Man of sorrows...acquainted with grief--not because of what they did to Him, but what they did to each other!

name: MARRIAGE-RELIGIOUS-INSTITUTION.md
en_content: Congress shall make no law regarding the practice of religion...marriage is a RELIGIOUS institution!

name: MEANINGLESS-LIFE-LIE.md
en_content: Religion: if no one's right, and everyone's wrong, then life is both meaningless AND a lie.

name: MEETING-UNCREATED-BEING.md
en_content: You haven't lived till you've met An Uncreated Being!

name: MEN-SHAVING-CHILDREN.md
en_content: It may be that women like us men to shave that they may treat us like children.

name: MERCY-OF-JESUS.md
en_content: Jesus is FAR MORE merciful and compassionate than you are!

name: MIRACLE-OF-SALVATION.md
en_content: Salvation (separating a sinner from their sin) is a miracle performed by God, not man.

name: MLK-MURDERED-GOOD-DEEDS.md
en_content: Remember: Martin Luther King Jr. was murdered -- not for his crimes, but for his good deeds.

name: MOST-BEAUTIFUL-GOD.md
en_content: There is no being God has created that is more handsome, beautiful or gorgeous than Himself.

name: MOTHER-OF-JESUS.md
en_content: Mary is the BIOLOGICAL mother of Jesus, not the SPIRITUAL mother of God.

name: MOVIE-ALREADY-OVER.md
en_content: The Bible says the movie is already over...roll the credits!

name: MYSTERY-OF-WOMAN.md
en_content: Adam did not see Eve being created; therefore Woman will always be a Mystery to Man.

name: NATION-FORGETTING-GOD.md
en_content: I'm watching a nation that has forgotten God turn into Hell.

name: NATIONAL-DEBT-STATS.md
en_content: The National Debt: $16 TRILLION...that's $30 million every second for a year!!!

name: NATURE-OF-THE-GODHEAD.md
en_content: Anyone who thinks they understand the Nature of the Godhead is a liar.

name: NEAR-COLLISION.md
en_content: An AA jet had a near collision with a United over AL...my sister was on the AA plane and could read the writing on the other plane.

name: NEED-FOR-FAITH.md
en_content: As long as there is ignorance, there will be a need for faith.

name: NET-VS-SELF-WORTH.md
en_content: Don't confuse net worth with self-worth.

name: NO-ANGER-SELFLESSNESS.md
en_content: There is no anger in selflessness.

name: NO-COMPLEXITY-FOR-GOD.md
en_content: Ideas like "complexity" and "difficulty" don't exist for God; so He is able to make my life EASIER!

name: NO-DIVINE-EXCUSES.md
en_content: God can and will forgive anything...but He will not excuse anything.

name: NO-GOD-FOR-CAMERAS.md
en_content: I am convinced that God doesn't perform for cameras.

name: NO-POOR-IN-HEAVEN.md
en_content: There are no poor in Heaven.

name: NOBODY-LOVES-LIKE-JESUS.md
en_content: My mother loved me VERY MUCH; but on her finest day she could not take away my sins...nobody loves me like Jesus!

name: NOT-BEING-GOD.md
en_content: I am not God; and I'm so glad that I don't have to be!

name: NOT-DYING-ALONE.md
en_content: God will let you die...but He will not let you die alone.

name: NOT-LOOKING-IDIOT.md
en_content: I don't mind being an idiot, just looking like one.

name: NOT-POLITICALLY-CORRECT.md
en_content: God is not politically correct.

name: NOTHING-AND-EVERYTHING.md
en_content: I am nothing to God...and yet...I am everything to God.

name: NOTHING-NEW-TRUTH.md
en_content: There is nothing new about Truth.

name: NOTHING-TO-OFFER.md
en_content: God is not interested in what you can offer Him; because the truth is that you have nothing to give God until He gives it to you first!

name: NOTHING-TO-WORLD.md
en_content: You cannot be something in God until you are nothing to the world.

name: NOTHING-WITHOUT-GOD.md
en_content: You are NOTHING without God; You are EVERYTHING to God.

name: NOTHING-WRONG-GOD.md
en_content: There is nothing wrong with God.

name: NUTRITION-MUSCLE-ACHES.md
en_content: Nutrition: Muscle aches may benefit from the following: Astaxanthin, Calcium, Magnesium, Bromelain, Creatine.

name: OBEDIENCE-AS-HIGHWAY.md
en_content: Obedience is like the lines on a highway: though restrictive, they will take you where you need to go.

name: OBEDIENCE-GATEWAY-GROWTH.md
en_content: Obedience is the ONLY gateway to spiritual growth.

name: OBEYING-GODS-CHARACTER-LAWS.md
en_content: Just because it's legal, doesn't mean it's ethical or just or fair. God doesn't expect us to obey laws that violate His Character.

name: OBSOLETE-HUMAN-RACE.md
en_content: The human race is obsolete...God is creating a new race with Christ as The Adam; familyship is granted by Grace through Faith.

name: OMNIPOTENCE-VS-FREEWILL.md
en_content: Free Will exists only due to human ignorance of The Divine Omnipotence.

name: ONE-TRUE-GOD-YHWH.md
en_content: I believe there is One True God -- YHWH; and Jesus Christ is His Living Word! Hebrews 1:1-4

name: ONLY-TOOL-PRAYER.md
en_content: Prayer is not our best tool; it's our ONLY tool.

name: OPPORTUNITY-FOR-ANGER.md
en_content: People don't need a reason to be angry...just an opportunity.

name: OPPRESSING-THE-POOR.md
en_content: Whoever oppresses the poor to increase his own wealth, or gives to the rich, will only come to poverty. Proverbs 22:16, ESV

name: OPPRESSIVE-WEALTH.md
en_content: The Bible says some nasty things about rich people who oppress the masses.

name: ORDERS-GIVING-TAKING.md
en_content: I'm highly suspicious of people who can give orders but not take orders.

name: OUTER-VS-INNER-BEAUTY.md
en_content: Outer beauty doesn't make up for inner ugly.

name: OVERCOMING-DEPRESSION.md
en_content: Long after the point when Depression ceases to be a memory...I will still be here.

name: OVERCOMING-FEAR-BLAME.md
en_content: If you keep blaming others for your fears, you'll never overcome them.

name: OWNING-ALL-THINGS.md
en_content: Revelation 21:7: You cannot own ALL THINGS unless you no longer need them.

name: PAYCHECK-VS-SOUL.md
en_content: Stop living like your paycheck is worth more than the dignity of your SOUL! Matthew 16:26

name: PENALTY-VS-SIN.md
en_content: We want to be saved from the PENALTY of sin but not sin itself.

name: PEOPLE-MORE-UNFORGIVING.md
en_content: People are FAR MORE unforgiving than God.

name: PERFECT-PEOPLE-CRITICISM.md
en_content: Have you ever noticed that perfect people don't respond well to criticism?

name: PERISHING-DEMOCRACY.md
en_content: Government of, by and for the People is perishing from the Earth!

name: PLANETARY-STARVATION.md
en_content: There's enough resources on Planet Earth for EVERYONE...so why are people starving?!?

name: POWER-OF-CREATIVE-LOVE.md
en_content: Love is not weak. Love created this insanely huge universe by simply SPEAKING!

name: POWER-OF-WEAKNESS.md
en_content: True Strength understands the Power of Weakness.

name: POWERLESS-CHURCH.md
en_content: The church that is without power doesn't understand The Gospel (Romans 1:16).

name: PRAYER-AND-CHOCOLATE.md
en_content: Is there a better way to start a day than with prayer and chocolate? I think not!

name: PRAYER-AS-RELIEF.md
en_content: Prayer is my relief.

name: PRAYER-BEFORE-SPEECH.md
en_content: It is inappropriate to speak out on what we don't pray out.

name: PRAYER-FOR-REVELATION.md
en_content: God knows things about the people around you that you have no idea of; if one of those things comes to light, it is so you can pray.

name: PRAYER-FOR-WISDOM.md
en_content: Lord Jesus, fill my mind with Your Wisdom; fill my heart with Your Love; fill my bowels with Your Mercy!

name: PRAYER-HAWAIIAN-VACATION.md
en_content: Prayer is my Hawaiian vacation.

name: PRAYER-MAKES-HUMAN.md
en_content: Prayer, above all else, is what makes me Human; without it, I'm just an animal.

name: PRAYER-MY-SHELTER.md
en_content: Prayer is my shelter...my fortress...my stress-free zone...my dessert.

name: PRAYER-NOT-JOB.md
en_content: Prayer was never meant to be a job.

name: PREEMINENCE-OF-GOODNESS.md
en_content: That which comes first has the preeminence; righteousness came before sin and goodness came before evil.

name: PREFERENCE-VS-NECESSITY.md
en_content: Preference must give way to Necessity.

name: PRICE-OF-PRIDE.md
en_content: At what point in history did African American men decide that pride was worth the price of killing each other??

name: PRIDE-IS-PRISON.md
en_content: Pride is a prison, and Unconditional Love the only Liberator.

name: PRIDE-VS-DIGNITY-RACE.md
en_content: Why do African American men confuse pride with dignity?

name: PRIEST-OF-CHRIST.md
en_content: As a priest of Christ, it's my job to speak God's Word (The Holy Bible) into the planetary atmosphere.

name: PRIVATE-INTERPRETATION.md
en_content: Where Satan can't stop Bible reading he distracts with private interpretation.

name: PROBLEM-AND-SOLUTION.md
en_content: Identifying the problem is only half the solution.

name: PROGRESS-AND-FAILURE.md
en_content: There's no progress without failure.

name: PROVING-CREATION.md
en_content: "In The Beginning God created the heavens and the Earth." -- Genesis 1:1 There's not a soul on the planet that can prove otherwise.

name: PSYCHOPATHIC-CORPORATIONS.md
en_content: The corporation as a legal "person" is demonstrably psychopathic.

name: PURPOSELESS-EXISTENCE.md
en_content: What is so scientific about saying that Existence has no purpose?

name: PURSUIT-OF-HAPPINESS.md
en_content: The pursuit of God is the pursuit of happiness. The pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of God.

name: QUALIFIED-TO-BREAK.md
en_content: The only Person qualified to break me is The One Who has demonstrated Their LOVE for me.

name: QUESTIONING-GODS-EXISTENCE.md
en_content: In a perverse generation they question God's Existence, when it's their existence and survival that has a question mark behind them.

name: READY-FOR-ANSWER.md
en_content: Asking a question does not mean you are ready for the answer.

name: READY-FOR-ETERNITY.md
en_content: We are all going to die; are you ready for Eternity?

name: REASON-TO-BE-ALIVE.md
en_content: The only reason we are alive is to find Jesus that He may take away our sin.

name: RECOGNIZE-OPPORTUNITY.md
en_content: The tragedy is that African American men do not recognize opportunity when they see it.

name: RECONCILING-ALL-THINGS.md
en_content: 1st Corinthians 15:24-28: God is #reconciling and consolidating all things into Christ.

name: RECONCILING-IN-CHRIST.md
en_content: 1st Corinthians 15:24-28: God is reconciling and consolidating all things into Christ.

name: RECREATING-INTENT.md
en_content: Fear of judgment will change our behavior...but not our hearts. Only the Love of Christ can recreate my intent.

name: REJECTED-CORNER-STONE.md
en_content: The Stone that the builders rejected...(smile)!

name: REJECTED-TRUTH-WEIGHT.md
en_content: The World will perish...crushed under the weight of the Truth it has rejected.

name: REJOICING-IN-OTHERS.md
en_content: I rejoice in the achievements God accomplished in you as though He had accomplished them in me.

name: RELATIONSHIP-WITH-FATHER.md
en_content: The Gospel: Jesus Christ has given us His Relationship with The Father!

name: RELENTLESS-LOVE.md
en_content: Love is ruthless...relentless...persistent and unflagging...thank God!

name: REMEMBERING-VS-LIVING-PAST.md
en_content: There's no sin in remembering the past...only in trying to live in it.

name: REMOVING-ALL-THINGS.md
en_content: "I will completely remove all things from the face of the earth," -- God, Zephaniah 1:2

name: RESCUE-BY-JOB.md
en_content: I wish to publicly thank God for rescuing us with a job that kept a roof over our heads and the lights on...Jesus is HOT STUFF!!!

name: RESPECT-AND-AFFECTION.md
en_content: Respect breeds affection.

name: RESPECTING-OUR-BODIES.md
en_content: We don't respect our own bodies yet we want others to respect us!

name: RESPONSIBILITY-NO-AUTHORITY.md
en_content: Responsibility without authority is like a boat without a motor.

name: REVELATION-ISRAELI-CHURCH.md
en_content: Revelation is not about the gentile church as much as the Israeli church. In this context, everything starts to make sense.

name: RICH-AND-WELFARE.md
en_content: The rich don't want to pay for welfare ...nor do they wish to hire welfare recipients.

name: SALARY-VS-VALUE.md
en_content: What's more valuable: my salary or me?

name: SALVATION-FOR-ANYBODY.md
en_content: Salvation is not for everybody, yet God can save anybody!

name: SANHEDRIN-CONCERNS.md
en_content: The Sanhedrin was more concerned about their authority and money than about serving God or God's people.

name: SAUL-WASTING-LIFE.md
en_content: Saul wasted a large portion of his life trying to kill David while neglecting weightier matters...like his relationship with God.

name: SAVED-FROM-GOD.md
en_content: God can save you from anybody...but who can save you from God?

name: SAYING-NO-TO-SELF.md
en_content: Only a person who can say no to themselves can say no to the world and to the devil.

name: SCENT-OF-GOD.md
en_content: It is Prayer, and Prayer alone, that places the Scent of God on us.

name: SCIENCE-AND-SCRIPTURE.md
en_content: No discrepancy exists between Science and Scripture; the discrepancy is between scientists and God.

name: SCIENCE-ON-ORIGIN.md
en_content: If I can't trust science to explain origin, why is it so infallible on development??

name: SEAT-OF-POWER.md
en_content: The Seat of True Power is in Heaven, where the Christ patiently waits for His Daddy to turn His Enemies into His footrest.

name: SECOND-COMING-STATS.md
en_content: One out of every 24 verses in the New Testament refers to the Second Coming of Christ.

name: SEED-DESIGN.md
en_content: Seeds are designed to know when their environment is appropriate for germination...God is Great!

name: SEEKING-VS-HEARING-GOD.md
en_content: You would think that a person desperate to hear from God would be desperate to seek God...

name: SELF-DECEPTION-FIRST.md
en_content: To deceive another, you must first deceive yourself.

name: SELF-DESTRUCTIVE-NATURE.md
en_content: We are self-destructive by nature and teach our children to be self-destructive.

name: SELF-TORTURE-OWNERSHIP.md
en_content: Self-torture implies self-ownership.

name: SHADOWS-OF-CHRIST.md
en_content: That which is most precious to us...and those whom we love more than life are but shadows of the Figure of Christ!

name: SHERBERT-AND-BLOWTORCH.md
en_content: You can't make sherbert with a blowtorch.

name: SHOULD-BE-VS-WILL-BE.md
en_content: Everything is as it should be, but not as it will be.

name: SHOVING-SUGAR-BODY.md
en_content: We keep shoving sugar into a body that itself manufactures sugar and then wonder why we get diabetes!

name: SHOWING-MERCY.md
en_content: Everybody wants Mercy...few show Mercy.

name: SIMPLE-AND-DEEP.md
en_content: The simplest things are the most deep; the deepest things are the most simple.

name: SIMPLE-RELATIONSHIP-CHRIST.md
en_content: A relationship with Christ is simple...I make it complicated.

name: SIN-IS-EXPENSIVE.md
en_content: Law enforcement, court costs incarceration, healthcare, security, protection, insurance premiums, funeral costs...Sin is expensive!

name: SIN-MAKES-IDIOTS.md
en_content: Sin makes idiots of us all; Christ came to take away the sins of the body (disease) as well as the sins of the soul!

name: SIN-TASTES-GOOD.md
en_content: Sin is killing us; but at least it tastes good!

name: SPARED-ON-FREEWAY.md
en_content: I lost my brakes on the freeway last nite; but God spared me from accident and injury and I got the car home.

name: SPIRIT-IS-LIFE.md
en_content: Spirit, not electricity, is Life.

name: SPIRIT-OF-CHRIST-ENCOUNTER.md
en_content: The greatest moment of my existence was being swallowed up by the Spirit of Christ...all I want is to go back (or forward) to that moment.

name: SPIRIT-TRANSFORMING-ENERGY.md
en_content: SPIRIT is so powerful; He can take frozen energy and transform it into Living Energy!

name: SPIRIT-VS-MATTER.md
en_content: SPIRIT is far older, stronger and eternally more powerful than matter.

name: SPITTING-IN-GODS-FACE.md
en_content: America can spit in God's Face over this gay thing if it wants to, but this is NOT going to end well for any of us.

name: SPITTING-ON-THE-CROSS.md
en_content: Jesus has been punished for the sin you have committed against me; if I don't forgive you I have spit on The Cross of Christ.

name: STANDARD-MODEL-OBSERVATION.md
en_content: Are you even aware that the Standard Model DOESN'T reflect what's actually being observed in the Cosmos??

name: SUFFERING-VS-SINNING.md
en_content: We are tired of suffering, yet we are not tired of sinning.

name: SUN-ENERGY.md
en_content: The Sun releases 5 million tons of matter per second...God is Great!

name: SUNS-ENERGY-CORE.md
en_content: Energy generated in the Sun's core takes a million years to reach its surface: God is great!

name: SUPPRESSING-THE-BIBLE.md
en_content: Where Satan cannot suppress the distribution of the Bible he has convinced the population to stay away from it.

name: TALKING-TO-PEOPLE.md
en_content: If you don't know how to talk to people, you probably shouldn't talk to people.

name: TEACHER-AND-IDENTITY.md
en_content: A teacher challenges your identity and your knowledge, then helps you discover both so that you can stand strong under pressure.

name: TEN-TRILLION-CELLS.md
en_content: The human body is made up of at least 10 trillion cells...God is great!

name: TERRIBLE-SECRETS.md
en_content: Secrets can be terrible things.

name: THE-BRINK-OF-EXTINCTION.md
en_content: Matthew 24:21, 22: It may be that Christ will not return until humanity is on the brink of extinction.

name: THE-FIRST-SIN.md
en_content: The First Sinner committed the First Sin by taking the credit for that which he did not create: himself.

name: THE-NEXT-LIFE-IMPORTANCE.md
en_content: There's NOTHING in this life that's more important than The Next Life!

name: THE-PRICE-OF-PROMISCUITY.md
en_content: People who are promiscuous wind up paying a terrible price.

name: THE-SUFFERING-GOD.md
en_content: In Christ God has suffered more than any human.

name: THREE-TYPES-OF-HUMANITY.md
en_content: Humanity: (1) those who place God 1st; (2) those who give God a priority other than 1st; (3) those who give God no priority at all.

name: TRAGEDY-IN-CHURCH.md
en_content: To be in church all one's life, and still go to Hell...what a tragedy!

name: TRANSFORMING-POWER-LOVE.md
en_content: God's Love is frighteningly powerful: turning dirt into flesh, flesh into spirit, sin into righteousness and death into life.

name: TRANSGENDER-RESTROOM-DEBATE.md
en_content: A bill that lets a transgendered male into a girls' restroom is one thing; getting that male past the girl's father is another.

name: TREASURE-UNDER-GARBAGE.md
en_content: Treasure is often hidden under garbage...be a treasure hunter!

name: TREATED-AS-FAMILY.md
en_content: God has always treated me as family, whether I deserved it or not.

name: TREATING-JUDAS-ISCARIOT.md
en_content: Do you think Jesus treated Judas Iscariot differently from the rest of the disciples?

name: TRUE-WEALTH-NEED.md
en_content: Matthew 10:34-39: One is not truly wealthy until they've lost their need for everything!

name: TRULY-HUMAN-ENGAGEMENT.md
en_content: One is not truly human until they have engaged their Creator.

name: TRUTH-AS-WEAPON.md
en_content: Truth is a weapon far more dangerous than the hydrogen bomb.

name: TRUTH-CONFIRMS-GOD.md
en_content: There is no truth that denies God's Existence.

name: TRUTH-EXPOSES-LIES.md
en_content: Truth is dangerous because it exposes lies that people believe to be true; and many would rather kill Truth than abandon their lies.

name: TWITTER-TO-HEAVEN.md
en_content: If I could, I'd take my Twitter followers to Heaven with me.

name: TWO-GARDENS.md
en_content: In the Bible there are 2 gardens. In the 1st garden are 2 trees; in the 2nd garden is only 1 tree. What happened to the 2nd tree?

name: TWO-TYPES-CHURCHES.md
en_content: There are two churches: (1) the institutionalized church, and (2) the REAL church elected by God; one is temporary, one is eternal.

name: ULTIMATE-REALITY-GOD.md
en_content: God is the Ultimate Reality. So if you're not interested in God, how real are you?

name: UNCONDITIONAL-LOVE-HATRED.md
en_content: God's Love is unconditional...as is His Hatred of evil.

name: UNCONDITIONAL-LOVE-PRAYER.md
en_content: Prayer is where I am loved unconditionally.

name: UNDERSTANDING-SIN-HELL.md
en_content: You will never understand how God feels about sin until you look into Hell.

name: UNEMPLOYMENT-STATS.md
en_content: White Unemployment : 9%...Black Unemployment : 16%.

name: UNEQUALLY-YOKED-MARRIAGE.md
en_content: The Christian who marries a unbeliever has the Devil for a father-in-law!

name: UNGRATEFUL-HUMAN-RACE.md
en_content: What single word best describes the human race? UNGRATEFUL.

name: UNITY-IN-CHRIST.md
en_content: True unity of spirit, soul, body, family, community and nation lies only in Jesus Christ.

name: UNIVERSAL-MERCY-REQUIREMENT.md
en_content: God has to have mercy on everybody in order to save anybody.

name: UNIVERSE-INSIDE-GOD.md
en_content: You do know that all of us--yeah, the entire Universe--is inside of God, right? Jeremiah 23:24

name: UNPATRIOTIC-CORPORATIONS.md
en_content: The corporation as a legal "person" is unpatriotic.

name: UNREASONABLE-PEOPLE-PROBLEM.md
en_content: Life would be perfect but for the presence of unreasonable people.

name: UNREASONABLE-PRIDE.md
en_content: Self Pride is always unreasonable.

name: UNSUSTAINABLE-WORLD-SYSTEM.md
en_content: I believe the Hebrew Scriptures...this world system is unsustainable.

name: VISIBLE-UNIVERSE.md
en_content: The Visible Universe: God Is Great

name: WANTING-DECEPTION.md
en_content: The Bible says that Satan has deceived us all...and we want to be deceived!

name: WANTING-FORGIVENESS-ONLY.md
en_content: We want to be forgiven, but we don't want to forgive...how disgusting.

name: WANTING-LOVE-ONLY.md
en_content: We want to be loved, but we don't want to love...how pathetic.

name: WAY-OF-EMPIRES.md
en_content: We are going the way of the Roman Empire and the Soviet Union.

name: WAY-TO-MANS-EGO.md
en_content: The fastest way to a man's heart is not through his stomach, but his ego.

name: WEALTH-DISPARITY-GAP.md
en_content: Median White household wealth: $US113,000. Median Black household wealth: $US5,700. Oh yeah...life's fair!

name: WEATHER-AS-COMMUNICATION.md
en_content: 2 Chronicles 7:12-14; Leviticus 18:25: Yes, God DOES communicate and punish through weather and nature.

name: WEIGHT-OF-GREED.md
en_content: America is finally buckling under the weight of its own greed.

name: WEIGHT-OF-SIN.md
en_content: Christ bore in His Body the sins of the 12 billion sinners who have lived since Adam.

name: WELFARE-JOB-CHURCH.md
en_content: Welfare is not the job of government; it's the job of the Church (Matthew 25:31-46).

name: WHISPER-OF-HOPE.md
en_content: When your mind says "Give up," Hope whispers "One more try!"

name: WHOLE-BIBLE-ACCEPTANCE.md
en_content: We should accept the whole Bible, or none of it; otherwise we distort its message.

name: WICKEDNESS-AND-GUN-LAWS.md
en_content: Humanity will continue to grow more wicked. As a nation we would be IDIOTS to leave our gun laws in their current state.

name: WISDOM-OF-GOD.md
en_content: God is older, wiser, smarter, more intelligent and more powerful than you.

name: WITHHOLDING-POWERS.md
en_content: God withholds powers from us because we do not give Him glory for powers already bestowed.

name: WITNESSING-GODS-PRESENCE.md
en_content: We assemble to witness the manifestation of God's Presence; it is there that sins are forgiven, yokes are broken and bodies are healed.

name: WORK-TO-BE-SAVED.md
en_content: Getting saved is hard work; but hard work alone won't get you saved.

name: WORLD-HATES-GOD.md
en_content: God loves the world. The world hates God. This is not going to end well for the world.

name: WRATH-OF-GOD.md
en_content: The worst thing Earth must face is not Antichrist, but The Wrath of God.
